title: Griftopia: Bubble Machines, Vampire Squids, and the Long Con Tha
description:
A brilliantly illuminating and darkly comic tale of the ongoing financial and political crisis in America

The grifter classÃ¢â‚¬â€made up of the largest players in the financial industry and the politicians who do their biddingÃ¢â‚¬â€has been growing in power, and the crisis was only one terrifying manifestation of how theyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve hijacked AmericaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s political and economic life.

He offers fresh reporting on the backroom deals of the bailout; tells the story of Goldman Sachs, the Ã¢â‚¬Å“vampire squid wrapped around the face of humanityÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½; and uncovers the hidden commodities bubble that transferred billions of dollars to Wall Street while creating food shortages around the world.

This is essential reading for anyone who wants to understand the labyrinthine inner workings of this country, and the profound consequences for us all.
